heading: HR01648
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE TRUE STATE OF OUR COUNTRY'S RICE SUPPLY WITH THE END IN VIEW OF PROPOSING REMEDIAL MEASURES TO ARREST POSSIBLE SHORTAGE AS WELL AS TO INSTITUTE POLICIES TO IMPROVE DOMESTIC RICE PRODUCTION AND ENSURE THE COUNTRY'S FOOD SECURITY
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2018-02-13
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01648
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE TRUE STATE OF OUR COUNTRY'S RICE SUPPLY WITH THE END IN VIEW OF PROPOSING REMEDIAL MEASURES TO ARREST POSSIBLE SHORTAGE AS WELL AS TO INSTITUTE POLICIES TO IMPROVE DOMESTIC RICE PRODUCTION AND ENSURE THE COUNTRY'S FOOD SECURITY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-02-05
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2018-02-13
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2018-02-07;
